description: Kallen Kaslana was an ancestor of the Kaslana lineage which were renowned for their excellent combat capabilities and Houkai adaptability. She was the most powerful among her fellow valkyries in her era and was http://anidb.net/character/104533 [Otto Apocalypse`s] first love interest but she did not return his feelings. Kallen wielded the Oath of Judah until her untimely death in the hands of a Houkai beast. http://anidb.net/character/104377 [Kiana Kaslana] is a descendant of hers.
name: Kallen Kaslana
